hero.headline: Visualizing the Art of the Possible for Schneider Electric
hero.subtitle: We brought 6 AI-driven concepts to life for ADIPEC 2025, transforming complex autonomous operations visions into compelling visual experiences that showcase the future of energy management.

challenge.heading: The Challenge
challenge.intro: Schneider Electric needed to showcase 6 AI-driven concepts at ADIPEC 2025—not just explain existing technology, but paint a compelling vision of autonomous operations and what the future could look like.

cards.title: 6 AI Concepts
cards.description: Six distinct AI-driven visions for autonomous operations, each requiring unique visual storytelling to communicate possibility without overpromising.

cards.title: Future Visualization
cards.description: Showing the 'art of the possible'—not just current capabilities, but where AI-powered energy management is heading. Inspiring without being speculative.

cards.title: ADIPEC Presence
cards.description: Standing out at the world's largest energy conference. Creating visual experiences that position Schneider as the leader in AI-driven autonomous operations.

approach.heading: Our Approach
approach.intro: We applied our AXD framework to create visual experiences that communicate AI capabilities while maintaining human understanding and trust.

steps.title: System Mapping
steps.description: Deep-dive into Schneider's AI architecture to understand data flows, decision points, and human-agent interactions.

steps.title: Visual Translation
steps.description: Transformed technical schematics into intuitive visual hierarchies that reveal complexity progressively.

steps.title: Design System
steps.description: Created a cohesive visual language with standardized layouts, motion rules, and color logic across all presentations.

steps.title: Production Pipeline
steps.description: Built an efficient Figma-to-PowerPoint workflow that reduced export errors and enabled rapid iterations.

work.heading: The Work
work.intro: We created a consistent design language combining dark spatial layers, neon accents, and glass-like depth. This approach gave Schneider's AI presentations a futuristic but credible tone.

cards.title: Color Palette
cards.description: Dark spatial base with Schneider green accents and cyan highlights for data visualization. Consistent across all AI concept presentations.

cards.title: Typography
cards.description: Clean, technical Inter typeface, highly legible at any size. Perfect for data-dense presentations and technical accuracy.

cards.title: Visual Principles
cards.description: Progressive disclosure of complexity, glass-like depth and layering, animated data flows, and consistent motion language.

cards.title: Agentic Experience Design
cards.description: Applied AXD framework to create visual experiences that communicate AI capabilities while maintaining human understanding and trust.

cards.title: Presentation Design
cards.description: Six distinct yet cohesive presentations, each showcasing unique AI-driven autonomous operations concepts.

cards.title: Production Workflow
cards.description: Figma-to-PowerPoint pipeline enabling efficient iteration and rapid deployment of presentation updates.

results.heading: Results
results.intro: Six AI-driven concepts brought to life, showcasing the art of the possible for autonomous operations. Schneider's presentations stood out as the most visually compelling at ADIPEC.

metrics.label: AI Concepts Visualized
metrics.description: All six concepts presented with unified visual language and consistent design principles.

metrics.label: the Possible Showcased
metrics.description: Future-forward vision of autonomous operations communicated clearly and compellingly.

metrics.label: Visual Identity Across All Concepts
metrics.description: Consistent design system enabling rapid iteration and brand coherence.

metrics.label: Design-Forward Presence
metrics.description: Most visually compelling presentations at ADIPEC 2025.
